name: Loading the Game - Demo
description:
What if a loading screen was actually... fun?  What if it fought you? What if it had pretty girls, monsters and cute  cats? What if a loading screen just wanted your love and to be admired  for a second?

In this humorous point-and-click game, you will need to use all of your wisdom to outsmart a narrator that is  trying to keep you away from cancelling the loading screen. Do you think  you are smart enough?

Use left mouse button to click, drag and drop.
